sentences: Kord olime suured semud, nüüd oleme võõramaks jäänud.
context: 'Semu' is an Estonian colloquial term for a friend or buddy. It can be used to refer to close male friends in an informal, familiar way. The word has a slightly old-fashioned but warm connotation and implies camaraderie and long-standing relationships. In some contexts, it can also be used more broadly to refer to 'a guy' or 'fellow' with either neutral or slightly derogatory undertones depending on the context.
